typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> southridgdvdesalesorders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> southridgdvdesalesdetails
